arts.ttl: Manchester City vs Borussia Dortmund – ‘Good news’ for German side, ‘crucial’ player trains on Tuesday
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund have been handed a major boost ahead of their clash against Manchester City. Defender Nick Schlotterbeck is back fit for the German side. That’s according to BILD, who report that Dortmund have been handed ‘good news’ ahead of the Champions League clash at the Etihad. arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola takes unprecedented step and gives Man City stars the DAY OFF - despite playing in the Champions League against Borussia Dortmund tomorrow
arts.sum: The decision is believed to have been made to keep legs fresh ahead of their fourth game of the competition and Guardiola has been consistent in his complaints at the packed fixture schedule.
